opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Cheney, Vice President of the United States v. United States District Court for the District of Columbia

opinion:
541 U.S. 971

CHENEY, VICE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES, ET AL.
v.
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA ET AL.

No. 03-475.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 5, 2004.

1

C. A. D. C. Cir. [Certiorari granted, 540 U.S. 1088.] Motion of respondent Judicial Watch, Inc., for divided argument granted.
